activities.description:
## Rafting at the Grand Canyon
 Experience the **adrenaline** in this _natural wonder_.
activities.title: Grand canyon rafting

activities.description:
## Explore the Cumbre Vieja **Volcano**
 Experience the **force** of this _natural beast_ on the beautiful island of La Palma
activities.title: Cumbre Vieja exploration

activities.description:
## Hot air Ballon ride over Cappadocia
 Experience the **tranquility** in this _natural beauty_.
activities.title: Balloon in Cappadocia

activities.description:
Want you to paddleboard on **Switzerland**?
 With a surface of almost _114 square kilometers_, Lake Lucerne is a popular destination for stand-up paddlers.
activities.title: Stand-up paddle surf in Lake Lucerne
